text:
Dr. Chan is very professional and accurate in his diagnosis and an experienced surgeon.

He treated me, my uncle, younger sister, nephew and a few ex colleagues.

I've seen few specialists from Mt E and KTP Hospital but they were unable to solve my ear problems. Last week I went to see Dr Chan and he immediately diagnosed my problem and I am OK now.

Thank you Dr Chan!
Dr Chan, he is the best ENT doctor. Highly recommended. Try him, no regrets.
Absolutely unprofessional and arrogant. What a horrible experience I had. Thank goodness I saw someone else who was the complete opposite after the humiliating horror show from him. Never again.
He is a very professional otolaryngologist
